entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT bad code gen for constrained call #99198
    9.0.0
  • The Syndication DateTimeHelper class throws an exception on some valid RFC822 dates #99193
  • [9.0-preview.1] Test process crash on Windows in Release mode with task throwing an exception #99187
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer - replace copy loop with span.CopyTo(destination) #99186

Closed

  • Running tests tries to run .NET Framework tests with mono on non-Windows #81395
    Future
  • ValidateEnumeratedItemsAttribute does not validate Dictionaries #97873
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add managed API surface area for ByRefLike Generic constraints #68002
    9.0.0
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers. #93890
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel client-user and pipeline types #97711
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • More SearchValues<string> tests #99197
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • DivRem 64by32 and 32by16 refactor in Decimal.DecCalc #99196
    needs-area-label
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the Syndication Feed RFC822 DateTimeParser #99194
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mention NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy for PublicSign #99184
    needs-area-label
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Expand small value sets to all case permutations in SearchValues<string> #98902
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Skip long values when building Rabin-Karp buckets in SearchValues #98901
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Use VN instead of GenTree in optGlobalAssertionIsEqualOrNotEqual #99182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GC hole in Guid #99138
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-reliability
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • SPMI: Expand PerfScore output #99158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ref struct pinning from locals #97997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Disable optimizations for b425314.dll test #99170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.1] Output from dotnet test when test process crashes is not shown to user with MSBUILDTERMINALLOGGER #39156
  • [Hot Reload] Enable Blazor hot reloading for multiple browser windows at the same time #39153
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.SDK Dependency on System.Text.Json - File not found through Azure Devops build #39152

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Discussion: Prototype for `dotnet tool update --all` #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Bump Application-Insights to 2.22 #38638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use Pattern Matching suggestion gives faulty code #72370
    Backlog
  • MetadataImportOptions.All doesn't work in source generators? #72369
  • CSharpScript.RunAsync fail with exception System.NotSupportedException: A non-collectible assembly may not reference a collectible assembly #72366

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Lazy work #72368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove a field from MultiDictionary.ValueSet #72367
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay create the SkeletonReferenceCache #72365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #72304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find usage message severity #72326
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #72305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Roslyn non-source-only build fixes #72360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JWT Token Validation Fails after Upgrade from .NET 6 to .NET 8 #54321
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54319
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #54318
  • PlatformNotSupportedException when navigating from Counter to Home page with multithreading enabled #54317
  • Error with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation in PublishSingleFile publishing mode #54315
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #54314
  • Converting existing Blazor Hosted project to Blazor Web App resulting in missing index.html #54313
  • instruction #54312
  • Documentation for integrating azure b2c on blazor interactive mode auto .net 8 #54310

Closed

  • Blazor Server .NET 8 SEO Problem head tags #54300
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #54275
  • Perf improvement: updates #54311
  • CancellationToken not working with a timeout on blazor #54280
  • Perf regression: json #54304
  • Route syntax highlighting and autocompletion #39441
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Schema change limits aspnetcore session state in SQL #44028
    .NET 8 Planning
  • OutputCache Attribute does not support Tags #45015
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Selectively Enable/Disable HealthChecks #42939
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add IIS Express launch profile for gRPC templates #38405
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Epic]: SignalR - .NET7 #38196
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [SignalR][TS Client] Typesafe connection #43144
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make ResponseCacheMiddleware endpoint aware #37995
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Ensure resource limit APIs can be used by existing implementations #32041
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Work with the runtime team to consume rate limiters in the BCL #37386
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Updated

  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview2
  • Prefer keys old enough to have propagated #54309
    area-dataprotection

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-02
entry.content:

  • App is crashing in IOS after installing from testflight #20960
  • Can't see wireless connected device for iOS #20958
  • 無法調試執行偵錯觀看設計介面 #20957

  • .NET 8 - iOS builds locally but not in CI environment #20956

PullRequests

Created

    community ✨

    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] System Fonts fix #20961
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView (#5063) #20959
    community ✨

Updated

    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix image loading tests #20955
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
